name: LD49 - Bullet Hellements
description:
Entry for LD49. Theme: "Unstable" 

LD link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/bullet-hellement

----------------------------------

This is a mix of puzzle game with bullet-hell. You're an nature spirit that is tasked with killing ROSE, the benevolent ruler that went crazy and corrupted the forest. Use FIRE, ICE, AIR and EARTH elemental powers to make your way to the final level!

----------------------------------

TEAM

  • Fiote [Developer] (https://twitter.com/FioTactics)
  • Mafellir [Artist] (https://www.instagram.com/mafe.llir)

----------------------------------

TECHNOLOGY:

The game was created in Unity!
